enter.label: Enter password
enter.error: A moderately strong password is required

repeat.label: Repeat password
repeat.hint: Enter the same spending password again
repeat.ok: Password confirmed and has a valid length

sign.label: Sign
sign.info: Enter the spending password of your wallet. It's the password you entered when you created/restored this wallet.
sign.error: The entered password does not match the spending password of this wallet.

addAccount.error: The entered password does not match the spending password of this wallet.

error.invalid: The entered word list is not a valid word list. Please check all words carefully.

message.title: Message password
message.caption: Enter the password to decrypt the message.

encrypt.hint: Enter a password for the transactions message

decrypt.hint: Enter the password to decrypt the transactions message

legacyBackup.title: Legacy backup password
legacyBackup.caption: Enter the password you used to encrypt the legacy backup file.

decrypt.hint: Enter the password to decrypt the backup
